overview.en: In the future, HGT hopes to establish a new real estate trading order, improve the work efficiency of enterprises and individual investors, connect with government regulatory departments and virtual asset exchanges, and build a good online trading environment for developers and investors.
overview.zh: HGT未来将建立一个新的房地产交易新秩序，提高企业和个人投资者的工作效率，同时对接政府监管部门和虚拟资产交易所，为开发商和投资者搭建良好的线上交易环境。
